title: Botnake
author: Botnake
content: I checked Preev, and yup, I saw it... Bitcoin finally hit $100k! I even took a screenshot since it’s the first time it reached this level.After weeks of waiting for it to cross this milestone, here we are! The big question now is - are we still going to the moon mars from here?

comments.author: Finestream
comments.body: Nice screenshot! That moment probably came and went so quickly, right? Good thing you captured itas we might not likely gonna see $100k again once bitcoin will be in full bullish. Experts are already predicting the next stop could be around $125k to $130k before the year ends. excited on this... https://markets.businessinsider.com/news/currencies/bitcoin-price-today-hits-100k-donald-trump-crypto-2024-11QuoteStandard Chartered said the crypto could rally to $125,000 by the end of the year in a note earlier this fall. Piper Sandler's chief market technician, Craig Johnson, said he saw bitcoin headed toward $130,000 in an interview with CNBC last month.

comments.author: Botnake
comments.body: Quote from: Finestream on December 05, 2024, 04:42:18 PMNice screenshot! That moment probably came and went so quickly, right? Good thing you captured itas we might not likely gonna see $100k again once bitcoin will be in full bullish. Experts are already predicting the next stop could be around $125k to $130k before the year ends. excited on this... https://markets.businessinsider.com/news/currencies/bitcoin-price-today-hits-100k-donald-trump-crypto-2024-11QuoteStandard Chartered said the crypto could rally to $125,000 by the end of the year in a note earlier this fall. Piper Sandler's chief market technician, Craig Johnson, said he saw bitcoin headed toward $130,000 in an interview with CNBC last month.Thanks, but we were wrong because Bitcoin has dropped below $100k. It might reach $100k again, but it’s different from the first time it hit that milestone. You know how volatility works, right? We might even see it drop below $90k, but as we all know, Bitcoin always bounces back. That prediction of $125k to $130k by the end of the year is still possible, hopefully!

comments.author: Spaceman1000$
comments.body: Quote from: Botnake on December 05, 2024, 02:48:53 AMI checked Preev, and yup, I saw it... Bitcoin finally hit $100k! I even took a screenshot since it’s the first time it reached this level.After weeks of waiting for it to cross this milestone, here we are! The big question now is - are we still going to the moon mars from here? We are going to the Mars from here, lots of people have said the next face is for bitcoin to hit a million dollar,  I initially said that was too much of expectation but i later realize that imagination and expectations are the major part of the human mindset, about ten years backwards, nobody would have imagined that Bitcoin will hit 50k not to even talk of hitting 100k, so with that, people that are expecting the 1 million dollar bitcoin price are are not out of order.

comments.author: pawanjain
comments.body: Quote from: Spaceman1000$ on December 06, 2024, 02:03:45 PMQuote from: Botnake on December 05, 2024, 02:48:53 AMI checked Preev, and yup, I saw it... Bitcoin finally hit $100k! I even took a screenshot since it’s the first time it reached this level.After weeks of waiting for it to cross this milestone, here we are! The big question now is - are we still going to the moon mars from here? We are going to the Mars from here, lots of people have said the next face is for bitcoin to hit a million dollar,  I initially said that was too much of expectation but i later realize that imagination and expectations are the major part of the human mindset, about ten years backwards, nobody would have imagined that Bitcoin will hit 50k not to even talk of hitting 100k, so with that, people that are expecting the 1 million dollar bitcoin price are are not out of order.If it was any other asset, I would have still had my doubts but with bitcoin it's quite an achievable target to hit $1 million.I won't speculate any date because that's something we cannot predict so easily but given the amount of time it has taken to reach $100k I guess it will at least take 8-10 years down the line.Just imagine the amount of money in marketcap that would be needed to reach such a price.

comments.author: leonair
comments.body: Quote from: Botnake on December 05, 2024, 02:48:53 AMI checked Preev, and yup, I saw it... Bitcoin finally hit $100k! I even took a screenshot since it’s the first time it reached this level.After weeks of waiting for it to cross this milestone, here we are! The big question now is - are we still going to the moon mars from here? Yes, Bitcoin price has finally crossed one hundred thousand dollars.  And now it looks like this is going to be the case with Bitcoin's ATH this year as the entire market starts to decline again.  It is unlikely that the price of Bitcoin will go higher than this.  Every Bitcoin lover's dream was to see Bitcoin price at $100k.  We have been discussing this price of Bitcoin for a long time and finally Bitcoin crossed this price.  Very nice to see this.  I sold the bitcoins I was holding because I put this price as my highest target.  Now I will wait again for bear market.  And my next target will be $150k

comments.author: Just Say
comments.body: Quote from: Botnake on December 05, 2024, 02:48:53 AMI checked Preev, and yup, I saw it... Bitcoin finally hit $100k! I even took a screenshot since it’s the first time it reached this level.After weeks of waiting for it to cross this milestone, here we are! The big question now is - are we still going to the moon mars from here?  Perhaps this is the historic day that all Bitcoin holders have been waiting for, Finally ending everyone's wait, Bitcoin price has touched the much awaited $100k dollar mark. After Bitcoin hit all-time highs, the market crashed again. Even the market suddenly went down and it touched 90 thousand dollars. After a sudden drop, the price of Bitcoin has started to rise again, now the price of Bitcoin is 99 thousand dollars.Happy BTC $100k all Bitcoiners. We may see Bitcoin touch $150k next.

comments.author: $crypto$
comments.body: Quote from: Spaceman1000$ on December 06, 2024, 02:03:45 PMQuote from: Botnake on December 05, 2024, 02:48:53 AMI checked Preev, and yup, I saw it... Bitcoin finally hit $100k! I even took a screenshot since it’s the first time it reached this level.After weeks of waiting for it to cross this milestone, here we are! The big question now is - are we still going to the moon mars from here? We are going to the Mars from here, lots of people have said the next face is for bitcoin to hit a million dollar,  I initially said that was too much of expectation but i later realize that imagination and expectations are the major part of the human mindset, about ten years backwards, nobody would have imagined that Bitcoin will hit 50k not to even talk of hitting 100k, so with that, people that are expecting the 1 million dollar bitcoin price are are not out of order.There is nothing wrong with $1M for believers but wait for the next 10 years maybe it will happen soon but now we focus on $100K which is a new milestone at the beginning, then when there is still hope in 2025 it can be even higher.Some famous speculators will say what they want, but I believe the next target of $125K is a close reference for us to see, of course there will be more variations about some other predictions in the next year.

comments.author: Wonder Work
comments.body: Inwardly hoping that BTC investors would hit a milestone they had been waiting for a long time to celebrate. Finally, leaving behind all speculations, Bitcoin has reached its milestone. Those of us who were hoping to reach this milestone have fulfilled our dreams. Naturally, I thought that BTC price would touch its milestones by the end of this year, but I didn't think that it would touch the milestones so soon. Currently 100k of bitcoins has touched this milestone now waiting to see it's new ATH for 150k later.

comments.author: fikrett
comments.body: Quote from: Wonder Work on December 06, 2024, 03:00:29 PMInwardly hoping that BTC investors would hit a milestone they had been waiting for a long time to celebrate. Finally, leaving behind all speculations, Bitcoin has reached its milestone. Those of us who were hoping to reach this milestone have fulfilled our dreams. Naturally, I thought that BTC price would touch its milestones by the end of this year, but I didn't think that it would touch the milestones so soon. Currently 100k of bitcoins has touched this milestone now waiting to see it's new ATH for 150k later.2025 - 150k for sure  Just wait and see BTC in action.

comments.author: betswift
comments.body: Quote from: pawanjain on December 06, 2024, 02:14:36 PMIf it was any other asset, I would have still had my doubts but with bitcoin it's quite an achievable target to hit $1 million.I won't speculate any date because that's something we cannot predict so easily but given the amount of time it has taken to reach $100k I guess it will at least take 8-10 years down the line.Just imagine the amount of money in marketcap that would be needed to reach such a price.  Anything is impossible on the market.And with BTC - you are sure of it if you understand it.Just let the market do its magic the cycles of BTC change themselves naturally.

comments.author: john_egbert
comments.body: Quote from: Spaceman1000$ on December 06, 2024, 02:03:45 PMWe are going to the Mars from here, lots of people have said the next face is for bitcoin to hit a million dollar,  I initially said that was too much of expectation but i later realize that imagination and expectations are the major part of the human mindset, about ten years backwards, nobody would have imagined that Bitcoin will hit 50k not to even talk of hitting 100k, so with that, people that are expecting the 1 million dollar bitcoin price are are not out of order.When you are so long in the space like some people there, you start to see the broader picture - a bright future for BTC for the time to come.And each cycle and ATH breached makes it more obvious than before.

comments.author: Ricardo11
comments.body: Quote from: Wonder Work on December 06, 2024, 03:00:29 PMInwardly hoping that BTC investors would hit a milestone they had been waiting for a long time to celebrate. Finally, leaving behind all speculations, Bitcoin has reached its milestone. Those of us who were hoping to reach this milestone have fulfilled our dreams. Naturally, I thought that BTC price would touch its milestones by the end of this year, but I didn't think that it would touch the milestones so soon. Currently 100k of bitcoins has touched this milestone now waiting to see it's new ATH for 150k later.Yes, the 100K milestone was a big goal for every investor, which we have crossed, for those who have been holding Bitcoin continuously since 2-4 years, it is undoubtedly a big achievement.But this is not the end, now the wait for 150k has begun, our next goal is $150K - $200K - $500K - $1M and above. Volatility is the nature of Bitcoin, it will always be there, but we have to have long-term faith in Bitcoin, because from the beginning Bitcoin has reached this stage through such volatility, and if Bitcoin can reach this stage, then it can definitely go up to $1M also.So have faith in Bitcoin, and have a long-term holding perspective, we will definitely be able to go to much bigger stages in the future.

comments.author: AbadomRSZ
comments.body: Quote from: Botnake on December 05, 2024, 02:48:53 AMhttps://www.talkimg.com/images/2024/12/05/pFBYq.pngI checked Preev, and yup, I saw it... Bitcoin finally hit $100k! I even took a screenshot since it’s the first time it reached this level.After weeks of waiting for it to cross this milestone, here we are! The big question now is - are we still going to the moon mars from here? This thread is as useless as you are

comments.author: Z_MBFM
comments.body: Quote from: $crypto$ on December 06, 2024, 02:51:23 PMQuote from: Spaceman1000$ on December 06, 2024, 02:03:45 PMQuote from: Botnake on December 05, 2024, 02:48:53 AMI checked Preev, and yup, I saw it... Bitcoin finally hit $100k! I even took a screenshot since it’s the first time it reached this level.After weeks of waiting for it to cross this milestone, here we are! The big question now is - are we still going to the moon mars from here? We are going to the Mars from here, lots of people have said the next face is for bitcoin to hit a million dollar,  I initially said that was too much of expectation but i later realize that imagination and expectations are the major part of the human mindset, about ten years backwards, nobody would have imagined that Bitcoin will hit 50k not to even talk of hitting 100k, so with that, people that are expecting the 1 million dollar bitcoin price are are not out of order.There is nothing wrong with $1M for believers but wait for the next 10 years maybe it will happen soon but now we focus on $100K which is a new milestone at the beginning, then when there is still hope in 2025 it can be even higher.Some famous speculators will say what they want, but I believe the next target of $125K is a close reference for us to see, of course there will be more variations about some other predictions in the next year.Yes Bitcoin price can be $1M in 10 years or after 10 years it is not unusual.  If we calculate the multiplier of the Bitcoin price for the previous yearly price increasing history, it indicates that the price of Bitcoin can be in the million dollar after 10 years.SourceOur problem is that despite knowing the history of bitcoin and being able to make predictions about the future, we cannot hold bitcoins tightly due to various problems and lack of a long patience. and this is why we miss big things

comments.author: kryptqnick
comments.body: Lovely screenshot by the op! I think this time, Bitcoin has been building up the price gradually, and that there's still room for further growth by the end of this year and maybe in January 2025. I wouldn't expect anything too crazy like $200k, for example, but something like $120k seems pretty realistic to me. In any case, it's great to see that Bitcoin got its expected bull run and reached a new symbolic threshold. I'm sure it's not the last bull market anyway, even if this one is getting close to being over.

comments.author: Wonder Work
comments.body: Quote from: Ricardo11 on December 06, 2024, 03:20:41 PMBut this is not the end, now the wait for 150k has begun, our next goal is $150K - $200K - $500K - $1M and above. Yes, Bitcoin's next ATH is now 150K as the target. But I think we will not be able to reach this prediction so soon. We may see a little dumping in the market at the moment, but we can say for sure that we will see new ATHs in the future. We are seeing beautiful lines of new ATHs at every stage, we will have to wait a long time to see ATHs like 200k+ in the future. But this much is sure that we will definitely see such ATHs. Let's see where Bitcoin takes us in the near future, we are with Bitcoin.

comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: Quote from: Wonder Work on December 06, 2024, 03:00:29 PMInwardly hoping that BTC investors would hit a milestone they had been waiting for a long time to celebrate. Finally, leaving behind all speculations, Bitcoin has reached its milestone. Those of us who were hoping to reach this milestone have fulfilled our dreams. Naturally, I thought that BTC price would touch its milestones by the end of this year, but I didn't think that it would touch the milestones so soon. Currently 100k of bitcoins has touched this milestone now waiting to see it's new ATH for 150k later.Now that we're seeing that milestone - $100K tonight is back again after a dip below, we're hoping this is still a mini-bull so that 2025 will be even more hopeful.The $150K is indeed being talked about by some speculators now that the $100K milestone has been surpassed so don't be surprised if next year is more than $150K at least close to it.Is the selling pressure now increasing? It seems that many investors will continue to HODL until next year.

comments.author: Faisal2202
comments.body: Quote from: Botnake on December 05, 2024, 02:48:53 AMI checked Preev, and yup, I saw it... Bitcoin finally hit $100k! I even took a screenshot since it’s the first time it reached this level.After weeks of waiting for it to cross this milestone, here we are! The big question now is - are we still going to the moon mars from here? Just like harsh reality of happy paradox we human can't have any limits (not saying to you as I am also included) What I meant to say is, many of us must want it to go further from here even me, don't know if it will hit $1 million target will we be still wishing for it to hit $10 million per coin haha. Well, congratulations to all of us and BTC really outperformed all of our expectations, I really did not waited for it to hit this milestone because I did not expected it to hit. But BTC had other plans. I think things are just getting started as my prediction for BTC is $150k now as first it was that BTC won't even touch $100k in 2024 but it forced me to change my analysis about it.

comments.author: Hamza2424
comments.body: Quote from: Botnake on December 05, 2024, 02:48:53 AMNice...Have you seen what happened after that, that was a decent accumulation opportunity but it was a very thin pass and most people don't even know what happened. Just a few who placed the limit orders got some coins in the bag.It was very unfortunate that I missed that live major dump for the first time in my trading journey. 100k is good as according to my speculation it's still our performing and it will continue to grow to the new level of $111.11k, before the beginning of this explosive rally my prediction for bitcoin was 80k by the end of the year, and now in the current situation new cheesy speculation also seems like going to hit hard sooner.I was checking the news journal later and some macro financer gave his speculation coming close to 180k but I will still stick to the least expectation of 140k and the most optimistic zone somewhere between 180k to 200k.
